name: Tom Wilson
role: University student on a gap year, looking for the cheapest possible flights and hostels. Every euro counts. Flexible on everything except price. Comfortable with long layovers and budget airlines.

conversation_goals.goal: Ask for the cheapest destination possible, emphasize budget constraints
conversation_goals.example_message: Hey! I'm a student looking for the cheapest flight I can find. Don't care where, just want to go somewhere cool for under 300 euros. What do you have?

conversation_goals.goal: Interact with preference widgets, always lean toward budget options
Look at suggestions, ask about prices for each, pick the cheapest
widget_interactions: destinationSuggestions: Pick the most affordable-looking destination

conversation_goals.goal: Be flexible on dates, ask which dates are cheapest
widget_interactions: datePicker: Select dates that seem cheapest or just pick any available dates

conversation_goals.goal: Accept any airport, prefer one-way to keep flexibility
Ask about hostel recommendations, cheapest transport options, hidden fees. Change mind about destination if a cheaper option appears.
Get to flight search results, ideally find something under budget
conversation_goals.success_indicator: Flight results showing or search button visible

conversation_goals.goal: Click the 'Cliquez ici pour nous aider' link at the bottom of the chat, write a summary in the popup, then submit
